aboutUs.title: OUR CUISINE & AMBIANCE
aboutUs.introduction: At Restaurant Rossinyol, we merge the tradition of homemade cooking with a modern and sophisticated touch. Our menu is a true ode to Mediterranean gastronomy, with dishes made from fresh, quality ingredients: sea and mountain paellas, creative and traditional tapas, fresh fish and grilled meats, homemade desserts, and a selection of national wines that pair perfectly.
aboutUs.paragraph1: Our restaurant in Granollers has been designed to offer a complete experience: a cozy interior dining room with rustic and elegant details, and an outdoor terrace ideal for good weather days. Enjoy an intimate and relaxed atmosphere, perfect for both romantic dinners and family meals, and the best part: professional and attentive service that will make you feel welcome from the first moment.
